abstract: Six student managers serve coaches and players of North Carolina men's basketball team; their tasks include, but are not limited to, taking food orders, recording statistics and rebounding for players in shooting sessions.
lead_paragraph: Six managers serve the North Carolina men’s basketball team, performing tasks like taking food orders, recording statistics and doing almost anything else the players or coaches ask.

headline.main: Treated as Part of the Team, Regardless of Playing Time
headline.print_headline: Part of the Team at North Carolina, Without Playing Time
headline.seo: North Carolina Student Managers Focus on Duties off the Court

snippet: Six managers serve the North Carolina men’s basketball team, performing tasks like taking food orders, recording statistics and doing almost anything else the players or coaches ask.
